H0.text: Bolts are the best fasteners for fastening the sides of a wooden birdhouse.

H1.text: Hooks are the best fasteners to use to fasten the sides of a wooden birdhouse.

H2.text: Nails are the best fasteners to use for fastening the sides of a wooden birdhouse.

H3.text: Pins are the best fasteners to use to fasten the sides of a wooden birdhouse.

A4.text: Finish nail (bullet head nail, lost-head nail) â€“ A wire nail with a small head intended to be minimally visible or driven below the wood surface and the hole filled to be invisible

A5.text: Nails are typically driven into the workpiece by a hammer or nail gun. A nail holds materials together by friction in the axial direction and shear strength laterally
